about_the_game: This DLC serves the only purpose: to give our players the opportunity to wish a Happy New Year and toss a coin to Salangan Games team. Since we do not let anyone go without gifts - 3 wallpapers for your desktop with your favorite characters in 4K format are rewarded!
detailed_description: This DLC serves the only purpose: to give our players the opportunity to wish a Happy New Year and toss a coin to Salangan Games team. Since we do not let anyone go without gifts - 3 wallpapers for your desktop with your favorite characters in 4K format are rewarded!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Happy New Year, Zeliria! - Gift For Humkey

short_description: Purchase this DLC to support the Salangan Games team and get 3 wallpapers in 4K!
